description: Incidents of anti-social behaviour over a 12 month period per 1,000 residents. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of residents being involved in an incident.
Bicycle theft offences over a 12 month period per 1,000 residents. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of residents being involved in a crime.
Burglary offences over a 12 month period per 1,000 households. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of households being involved in a crime.
Robbery offences over a 12 month period per 1,000 residents. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of residents being involved in a crime.
Vehicle crime offences over a 12 month period per 1,000 residents. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of residents being involved in a crime.
Violence and sexual offences over a 12 month period per 1,000 residents. Higher rates indicate a greater average risk of residents being involved in a crime.
